channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping large telly stand, 25th December
item.description:
Please collect the grey television stand outside 2a Lawrence buildings at junction with Garnham Street. Thank you and a very happy Christmas!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Garnham Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Cars parked on pavement and across cycle lane continually!

item.title: Tree fallen on lamp post through walkway, 25th December
item.description:
A big tree got fallen on lamp post & through walkway at the entrance of Gallions Park in West Thamesmead. Please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Close, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Curb stones collapsed into our communal area, 25th December
item.description:
The kerb on Fisher Close has collapsed following repeated vehicle impact. Due to the manner in which the kerb was installed directly against the boundary fence of our building, its displacement has caused the fence to be pushed out and unstable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooksbys Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous fallen tree over footpath., 25th December
item.description:
A tree has fallen over the footpath and is only being held up by branches of another tree. There is a possibility that the tree may fall unexpectedly an cause injury.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish attracts vermin, 25th December
item.description:
Please clean and prosecute. This is near food shops and health and beauty shops, etc. Please investigate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside door 17, 25th December
item.description:
The pot hole has been here for weeks, it looks like it’s getting worse everyday the floor is sinking
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Grafton Terrace, Gospel Oak, Greater London

item.title: Camera that regulates LTN damaged, 25th December
item.description:
The camera that regulates the LTN has had its cable cut.. I’m not exactly sure why there’s an exposed cable for this and it’s not protected. I would prefer the LTN is functioning because it keeps traffic calmer in the neighborhood.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Whittington Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road, 24th December
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE21 on the opposite side of the road to house 183 is a green plastic road sweeper’s bag bin which is tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin & picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosendale Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: On the electricity substation gates next to 50 Bromley Rd, Beckenham nr jct with Wickham Rd, is one of the prolific 'Floor sanding + land-line telephone number' hardboard flyposted advertisement strips affixed with felt roof tacks., 24th December
